title: Evolution Simulation
subtitle: Neuroevolution in Rust
description: Implementation of a neural network and genetic algorithm in Rust. Creatures, powered by a neural network, must find food to survive and the strongest reproduce. Over time, the genetic algorithm will train the neural networks to find the best solution.

title: Particle Simulator
subtitle: A simple particle simulator to explore kinetic theory
description: Applies concepts from kinetic theory to estimate the pressure of an ideal gas through collisions of the molecules with the container walls.

title: Last.FM Data Visualizer
subtitle: Visualizing data collected from the Last.FM API
description: A web application that allows users to fetch their data from Last.FM then use it to explore a variety of visualizations. Uses the visx library to create highly customized visualizations.

title: Botfjord
subtitle: A chess engine written in Rust
description: Monte Carlo Tree Search based chess engine, written in Rust, handling game connections with Python. Utilizes threads to search multiple trees in parallel, significantly improving performance.
